text: Qaumeṅ ġhusse meṅ āīṅ to terā ġhazab nāzil huā. Ab murdoṅ kī adālat karne aur apne ḳhādimoṅ ko ajr dene kā waqt ā gayā hai. Hāṅ, tere nabiyoṅ, muqaddasīn aur terā ḳhauf mānane wāloṅ ko ajr milegā, ḳhāh wuh chhoṭe hoṅ yā baṛe. Ab wuh waqt bhī ā gayā hai ki zamīn ko tabāh karne wāloṅ ko tabāh kiyā jāe.”
